methods.name: publish

parameters.name: topic
parameters.summary: The name of the topic to publish to

parameters.name: event
parameters.summary: An event to distribute to the topic listeners

methods.summary: Publishes a message to a topic on the pub/sub hub. All arguments after the first will be passed to the subscribers, so any number of arguments can be provided (not just event).

methods.name: subscribe

parameters.name: listener
parameters.summary: A function to call when a message is published to the given topic

methods.summary: Subscribes to a topic on the pub/sub hub
